/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades adorned with vibrant signs and advertisements that add a splash of color to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the busy traffic typical of city life. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a clear blue sky, a common sight in many urban areas. The image provides a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing, showcasing the city's vibrant street life and architectural charm.
